markdownRemark.html: Situated 14 kms from Marbella, El Paraiso Golf Club offers one of the best enjoyment/price ratio in golf on the Costa del Sol. Easily walkable, It can be enjoyed by any level of player. Designed by Gary Player, the course has a mostly flat nature, a couple of holes uphill, wide forgiving fairways and excellent greens.

frontmatter.title: El Paraiso Golf Club
frontmatter.description: El Paraiso Golf Club - Situated 14 kms from Marbella, El Paraiso Golf Club offers one of the best enjoyment/price ratio in golf on the Costa del Sol. Easily walkable, It can be enjoyed by any level of player. Designed by Gary Player, the course has a mostly flat nature, a couple of holes uphill, wide forgiving fairways and excellent greens.
frontmatter.address: Urb. El Paraiso, Ctra. de Cádiz, KM. 167, Estepona, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 65.00 euro, Highest green fee weekends 65.00 euro
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
